data.message: I've never celebrated my Birthday, and never heard the phrase "Happy Birthday" because people are too much busy in life. When I joined Facebook, Many of my friends started sending greetings annually. Thank you Facebook, for the important persons in my life to notify my friends and make them remember the very important day in my life just like how it felt like to reach a billion facebook users. My Regards to Mark.  :) I love you Facebook!!!!

replies.message: Thanks for sharing, Kael. We're here to make the world a better and smaller place. We're very honored and proud that you're part of our community! -Rey
I love you too Kael Principe y amo a facebook, es una herramienta útil y necesaria para la vida.....My very best wishes for both. XOXO haha
